cause.description:
Threw the times the world, all STI's numbers have grown. The Youth are the ones who if we educate with the knowlege will carry the message Peer to Peer and hopefully the numbers will go down. Get Involved in the Fight Against Hep-C, HIV/AIDS and All Other STI's
Let Your Voice the the one that makes the difference!
1. Get Involved in the Fight Against Hep-C, HIV/AIDS and All Other STI's
cause.mission: spread the Education of STI's threw Promotion in order to Prevent.
cause.name: Taking the Voices of Our Youth to the Streets
